attr.title: Deltarune
attr.desc: In this sequel to Undertale, Kris and Susie are drawn into a mysterious Dark World, where they join forces with Ralsei to close the Dark Fountains and restore balance. Along the way, they encounter strange foes, form unlikely friendships, and uncover new mysteries tied to the world of monsters.
attr.inst: Download the Deltarune LTS Demo on Steam (switch to the LTS beta branch) and add all files to `ports/deltarune/assets/install`.
